page.title: 12QUAY LANE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: {Quay Lane Industrial Estate}is one of several industrial estates administered by Gosport Borough Council. It consists of twenty four units which are currently occupied by thirteen companies. Four units are presently vacant. The occupants include a coach depot, furniture manufacturer, plastics manufacturer, several motor engineers, a tent manufacturer, a scrap metal dealer and a boatyard. A number of the companies have been at Quay Lane for several years and are permanently based there. The industrial estate also houses a number of one or two man firms who are just starting out. Many firms start in this way and then successfully expand to larger, more permanent premises elsewhere.
